messages: 22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:18): tbsaunde, : can you give me your e-mail?
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:19): can anyone help me with a detail?
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:21): I want to turn them into a file and send to tbsaunde
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:22): because it's not a patch to a specific bug, only something he asked me if I could do
940baac7a8cf188d66395b0115b78dc5 (00:22): hg diff to get a diff of the local changes
940baac7a8cf188d66395b0115b78dc5 (00:22): or better, you can use mercurial Queues https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Mercurial_Queues
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:23): I even did hg qnew -f StateListPatch
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:27): tbsaunde,  can you give me your e-mail?
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:27): I would send you this modification with macro
940baac7a8cf188d66395b0115b78dc5 (00:28): I had to gid in the bugzilla email
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (00:28): askalski: I filed a bug for that this morning or last night, I don't remember the number though
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (00:28): usually use {hg,git} log to find emails
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (00:29): askalski: you know how to use qrefresh right?
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:29): and I said I will do it tomorrow
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:29): before going asleep, so I didn't want to learn new stuff
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:29): yeah, but I wanted to have something done before going to sleep :)
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (00:30): askalski: sure, that was suposed I usually do not you should :)
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:30): tbsaunde, I might be tired, but I don't understand last message
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:32): tbsaunde: is the patch format etc ok?
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:32): great. so I go to sleep and pick up something more tomorrow
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:33): thanks everyone for some guidance and easy assignments
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (00:33): askalski: you should add -U8 -p to something other in your hgrc as diff options
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (00:35): askalski: no, for this its fine, but when you ask for reviews a lot of people require the right format
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:36): tbsaunde, : and what should I add to get the right format?
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:36): I added these lines *after* generating the patch
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (00:37): askalski: hg qrefresh should be enough
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (00:40): ok, so I go to sleep
